Playing around with [aschinchon](www.twitter.com/aschinchon) strange attractor algorithm. The original blog post can be found [here](https://fronkonstin.com/2019/01/10/rcpp-camaron-de-la-isla-and-the-beauty-of-maths/). My version of the code is on [my github](https://github.com/kruse-alex/strange_attractor). The code to create the artworks is embedded in a twitter bot which automatically post images with different parameters every hour.
